'''Radiant Spincrystals''' are items that can be used to unlock [[Soundtracks]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

They can be obtained from the Teapot Traveling Salesman [[Chubby]]. Duplicate copies of the same soundtrack cannot be purchased. Some Radiant Spincrystals can also be found in the open world in [[Mondstadt]], [[Liyue]], [[Inazuma]], and [[Sumeru]].

While the Radiant Spincrystals [[Chubby]] has in stock are not affected by quest completion progress of the [[Serenitea Pot]] owner, some Spincrystals are not purchasable by the player unless certain quests have been completed.

[[Realm Music]] can be accessed from the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] and [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]].
